projects.title: TS-III Defense Rover
projects.short_description: Autonomous rover integrating YOLO object detection with sensor fusion for obstacle and threat detection.
projects.problem: Military and security patrol require autonomous threat detection in GPS-denied environments.
projects.solution: Built a rover platform with YOLOv7-based detection, LiDAR-camera fusion, and edge inference on Jetson Nano, achieving real-time autonomous navigation.
contributions: Designed end-to-end perception pipeline (camera + LiDAR fusion)
Trained and deployed YOLOv7 model on Jetson Nano (12 FPS)
Implemented ROS2 navigation stack with obstacle avoidance
Led hardware integration and field testing (3 environments)
projects.summary: Autonomous defense rover with real-time YOLO detection and sensor fusion. Achieved 93% detection accuracy at 12 FPS on edge hardware.

projects.title: Smart Agriculture Monitoring System
projects.short_description: IoT-based crop health monitoring using multispectral imaging and edge ML for early disease detection.
projects.problem: Crop diseases detected too late cause significant yield loss in smallholder farms.
projects.solution: Deployed multispectral camera drones with lightweight CNN classifiers on Raspberry Pi for early disease detection, integrated with a farmer-facing dashboard.
contributions: Developed lightweight CNN for leaf disease classification (96% accuracy)
Built data pipeline from drone captures to Pi inference
Created REST API and simple dashboard for farmers
projects.summary: Edge ML system for crop disease detection using multispectral imaging. 96% classification accuracy with 45ms inference on Raspberry Pi.

projects.title: EMG-Controlled Prosthetic Hand
projects.short_description: Low-cost prosthetic hand controlled by EMG signals with real-time gesture classification.
projects.problem: Commercial prosthetic hands are prohibitively expensive for patients in low-resource settings.
projects.solution: Designed a 3D-printed prosthetic hand controlled via surface EMG signals, using an ADS1015 ADC and Arduino with a lightweight gesture classifier.
contributions: Designed EMG signal acquisition circuit (ADS1015 + analog front-end)
Trained SVM gesture classifier (5 gestures, 91% accuracy)
Built 3D-printed mechanical hand with servo actuation
projects.summary: Low-cost EMG-controlled prosthetic hand with 91% gesture accuracy. Total BOM cost under $120.

papers.citation: A. Author, B. Author. "Real-Time Object Detection for Autonomous Defense Platforms Using YOLOv7." Proceedings of the International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA), Springer, 2025. DOI:10.1000/xyz123
papers.abstract: We present an optimized YOLOv7 pipeline for real-time threat detection on resource-constrained edge platforms, achieving 93% mAP at 12 FPS on Jetson Nano hardware.
contribution: Designed the detection pipeline and training methodology
Conducted all edge-deployment experiments and benchmarking
papers.summary: YOLOv7 optimization for edge-based defense applications with real-time performance on Jetson Nano.

papers.citation: C. Author, A. Author. "Surface EMG Gesture Classification for Low-Cost Prosthetic Control." Journal of Biomedical Engineering, Elsevier, 2023. DOI:10.1000/abc456
papers.abstract: This work introduces a lightweight SVM-based gesture classification system for surface EMG signals, targeting affordable prosthetic hand control in resource-limited settings.
contribution: Developed signal processing and feature extraction pipeline
Led user study design and data collection
papers.summary: Lightweight EMG gesture classification for affordable prosthetic control using SVM on embedded hardware.

patents.title: Adaptive Washing Machine System for Non-Fabric Materials
patents.abstract: An adaptive washing system that dynamically adjusts cycle parameters based on material composition analysis, enabling safe cleaning of non-fabric items such as sports equipment, toys, and industrial components.
claims: A sensor-driven material classification module that determines optimal wash parameters
An adaptive cycle controller that modifies water pressure, temperature, and agitation based on classified material type
patents.summary: Patent for an adaptive washing machine that classifies non-fabric materials and adjusts cleaning cycles automatically.
